content:
Question for Teku (cc <@425907307621122049> ):
I don't understand these logs:
```
2024-09-08 13:59:32.103 INFO  - Created availabilityChecker for slot 322
2024-09-08 13:59:32.103 INFO  - Starting data availability check for slot 322
2024-09-08 13:59:32.103 INFO  - Requested checkDataAvailability for 0x0a62f11b1ef095c2f2c25e8789d4735579a4d1962ccb804add8be35885ba1b7c(322)
2024-09-08 13:59:33.911 INFO  - Collected block 0a62f1..1b7c (322), index 23, 1st cell 009313f041f9b7, commitments 5, proofs 5,block 0a62f1..1b7c (322), index 55, 1st cell 00000000000000, commitments 5, proofs 5,block 0a62f1..1b7c (322), index 80, 1st cell 6490bc7e99f9c5, commitments 5, proofs 5,block 0a62f1..1b7c (322), index 98, 1st cell 19587f9814ded6, commitments 5, proofs 5 DataColumnSidecars in checkDataAvailability for 0x0a62f11b1ef095c2f2c25e8789d4735579a4d1962ccb804add8be35885ba1b7c(322)
2024-09-08 13:59:33.911 INFO  - [nyota] DataColumnSidecarDB.addSidecar: new slot: 322, prevSlot count: 4, total added: 1272, finalizedSlot: 287
2024-09-08 13:59:33.930 INFO  - Availability check slot 322 result: DataAndValidationResult{validationResult=VALID, dataSize=4, cause=Optional.empty}
2024-09-08 13:59:36.002 INFO  - Slot Event  *** Slot: 322, Block:  ... empty, Justified: 9, Finalized: 8, Peers: 5
```
For slot 122, there is the log `collected block`, and the log `Availability check` has `validationResult=VALID`, **but**  the last log says `Block:  ... empty`.

==> If the block has been correctly received AND the availabilty check is OK, why then the block is empty?
